data.description: Manipulate any kind of SQL like an XML DOM
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The name choice is one of the most accurate descriptions of what
    this module does. This module should be listed because it is useful
    and there is no other that does much of what it does. See the
    previously posted (4 hours earlier) RFC for more details.
